p: In regard to fatty acid composition, even if Bottari et al. in 1999 [ 18] observed the presence of more than 60 peaks by gas chromatography and mass spectrometry (GC-MS) and identified fatty acids with even numbers of carbon atoms from C12 to C30 as well as C15 and C17, the major fat components were saturated and unsaturated C16 and C18 and particularly C16:0, C18:1 and C18:2, which together represented around 90% of the total.
